inkball

Class YellowTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Entity
      • inkball.YellowTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class YellowTile
extends Entity
implements Drawable
    The YellowTile class represents a yellow tile that moves around the perimeter of the game board.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class inkball.Entity

        color

        Constructs a YellowTile object with a starting position and image.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x-coordinate.
        y - The initial y-coordinate.
        color - The color index (if needed).
        p - The App instance used to load images.
